column2: an A.M. Eatery////HIGHLY overrated. I was one of the SUCKERS who waited for their overpriced and overrated food. There are MANY way better breakfast options out there. I don't know if it just me
column3: but the name of the restaurant is EXTREMELY IRRITATING. Snooze. Stupid name. The place is clean and the service is good. It's just the food and the name that suck.
